name: FileTransferUtil
short_description: A Simple Java Util for exporting and importing files via FTP/FTPS. It can either work in Pull Mode (Download files from FTP server to your local machine) or Push mode (Upload files from local machine to FTP Server). It uses FTP4J-1.7.2 Java Library  for FTP functionality and JCommander-1.3.2 for Command Line argument interface. It can be configured to run periodically say for every n seconds.
summary: Simple Java Util for exporting and importing files via FTP/FTPS

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators
Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers
